img_above_text:
The Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine can be found here, along with a **Meditation Spot** in the middle of the pool.
The Carvings, Pool of Shattered Jade Meditation Spot
img_below_text:
Grab the green Wisp on this side of the broken bridge, and then look past the Shrine for a small passageway full of -- you guessed it -- hanging cocoons.
![Wukong UpperHollow 35.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/47/Wukong_UpperHollow_35.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a player character standing in a dark, web-covered area filled with large hanging cocoons, suggesting a foreboding and possibly dangerous environment. This scene follows the Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine and Meditation Spot, with the player seemingly exploring a small passageway behind the shrine, as mentioned in the guide. The visual highlights the eerie atmosphere and the presence of interactive elements, such as the glowing eye symbol on one of the cocoons.
